resources.string: Welcome to Tourify! We are here to help you discover and plan the trip of your dreams. Explore amazing destinations, from beautiful beaches to historic cities, all in one app.

With Tourify, planning a trip is easier and more fun. Find recommendations on the best places to visit, exciting activities you can do, and travel packages that suit your needs. Lets start your adventure with Tourify!
Password Cannot be Less Than 8 Character

The Great Asia Africa: A Historical and Cultural Destination on Jalan Asia Afrika, Bandung

 The Great Asia Africa, located on Jalan Asia Afrika in Bandung, is a unique destination that allows visitors to explore the rich history, art, and culture of two diverse continents. This site offers a profound insight into the diplomatic journey and international relations between Asia and Africa.

 **Attractions and Facilities**

 Visitors can explore museums and galleries showcasing artifacts, documents, and artworks that illustrate the journey of the Asia-Africa Conference of 1955. This conference was a significant event in global history, bringing together leaders from Asian and African countries to discuss cooperation and solidarity.

 The site also features beautiful gardens and open spaces, providing a serene atmosphere amidst the bustling city of Bandung. Visitors can enjoy the lush green scenery, relax, and spend quality time with family and friends.

 Regularly scheduled cultural performances highlight the history and traditions of Asia and Africa. These performances include traditional dances, music, and dramas that bring the rich cultures of these continents to life.

 The Great Asia Africa offers ample parking and comfortable rest areas to ensure a pleasant visit. These rest areas are equipped with shaded seating and other amenities for maximum comfort.

 Various kiosks along the site sell unique souvenirs and memorabilia from Asia and Africa. Visitors can purchase distinctive items as keepsakes or gifts for loved ones.
